app.name: CycleSense
app.description: Track your menstrual cycle and fertility windows with ease and privacy

seo.title: CycleSense - Period & Fertility Tracker
seo.description: Track your menstrual cycle and fertility windows with ease and privacy. Free period tracking app with ovulation calendar and cycle predictions.
seo.keywords: period tracker, menstrual cycle, fertility calendar, ovulation tracker, menstruation app

calendar.title: Calendar View
calendar.description: View your period days, fertile window, and ovulation dates

dataManagement.title: Data Export & Import
dataManagement.description: Export your data to save it or transfer it to another device. You can also import previously exported data.
dataManagement.note: Note: Importing data will replace all existing data. Make sure to export your current data first if you want to keep it.

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.content: CycleSense stores all your period tracking data locally in your browser. Your information never leaves your device and is not shared with any servers or third parties.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.content: CycleSense uses your cycle history to predict future periods and fertility windows. Predictions become more accurate as you log more data. The app calculates fertility windows based on the average 28-day cycle, with ovulation typically occurring 14 days before the next period.

dataStorage.title: Data Storage
dataStorage.content: Your data is stored using your browser's localStorage feature. Clearing your browser data or using private/incognito mode may affect your saved information. For best results, use CycleSense consistently on the same device and browser.

notes.label: Notes (optional)
notes.placeholder: Add any symptoms or notes about this period...

cycleLength.label: Average Cycle Length (days)
cycleLength.description: The number of days from the first day of your period to the day before your next period. The average is 28 days, but can range from 21 to 45 days.

periodLength.label: Average Period Length (days)
periodLength.description: The number of days your period typically lasts. Most periods last 3 to 7 days.

resetConfirm.title: Are you sure?
resetConfirm.description: This action will permanently delete all your tracking data and reset your settings. This cannot be undone.

success.periodAdded: Period has been added to your calendar
success.settingsSaved: Your cycle settings have been updated
success.dataCleared: All your tracking data has been reset

dataExported.title: Data Exported
dataExported.description: Your data has been exported successfully. Keep this file safe for future use.

dataImported.title: Data Imported
dataImported.description: Your data has been imported successfully. The page will refresh to show your imported data.

error.selectDates: Please select both start and end dates for your period
error.startAfterEnd: Start date cannot be after end date
error.longDuration: Period duration seems unusually long. Please verify your dates.
error.invalidCycleLength: Cycle length should be between 21 and 45 days
error.invalidPeriodLength: Period length should be between 2 and 10 days

dataImport.title: Import Failed
dataImport.description: There was an error importing your data. Please make sure you're using a valid CycleSense data file.

noData.addPeriod: Add your period to see statistics
noData.trends: Track at least two cycles to see your trends

fertilityWindow.title: No upcoming fertility days
fertilityWindow.description: Check back after your next period
